Getting Started¶

swmr_tools is a python package for making live data processing of hdf5_files easy. swmr_tools can be installed from PyPi using the command:

pip install swmr_tools

Alternatively you can clone the git repository containing swmr_tools using:

git clone https://github.com/rparke/Iterator
